summary:
Speech Analytics For Outside Sales - Coach your reps with virtual ridealongs to increase their sales

 The End of Ridealongs - Virtual ridealongs give you recordings, transcriptions, summaries, and analytics from every sales visit. Review them, make comments, create highlights, and more.

 Gain 100% Visibility into Every Sales Conversation - Virtual ridealongs give you recordings, transcriptions, summaries, and analytics from every sales visit. Review them, make comments, create highlights, and more.

 Save Time and Coach 8x Faster - Sales managers who coach with Rilla's AI are 8x faster and 20x more efficient. Give all your reps feedback every day. And allow your managers to coach 2x the number of reps.

 Coach from anywhere. - With Rilla, you can coach from anywhere. Your sales managers no longer need to live in a plane. They can coach all your reps right from their home or office.

 Win More with Rilla - 0% Avg increase in close rates. 0X Avg time savings for Sales Managers. 0% Avg increase in ticket price.
